title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1056/91 of 25 April 1991 amending Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1056/91  of 25 April 1991  amending Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
The combined nomenclature annexed to Regulation (EEC) No 265/87 is hereby amended as follows:
1. The following additional note 1 is added to Chapter 21:
'1. For the purpose of subheadings 2101 10 91, 2101 20 10, 2106 10 10 and 2106 90 91 the term "starch" also covers starch breakdown products.'
2. Current additional notes 1 and 2 now become 2 and 3.  Article 2
This Regulation shall enter into force three weeks after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 April 1991. For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 37, 9. 2. 1991, p. 24. (3) OJ No L 323, 29. 11. 1980, p. 7. (4) OJ No L 63, 9. 3. 1991, p. 24. (5) OJ No L 141, 12. 6. 1969, p. 24. (6) OJ No L 392, 31. 12. 1987, p. 19.
